item.title: [PI] Vengance orb [PI]
item.dc:creator: @i_code_rsps i code rsps
item.description:
@i_code_rsps wrote:

First off what im explaining today is making an item that casts vengance when you click it. Ofcourse theres a timer and requires 94 magic but no runes are invovled this would be good for donators.

Open up ClickItem.java ~~~ src>server>model>players>packets.

under the code:

public void processPacket(Client c, int packetType, int packetSize) { int junk = c.getInStream().readSignedWordBigEndianA(); int itemSlot = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordA(); int itemId = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordBigEndian(); if (itemId != c.playerItems[itemSlot] - 1) { return; }

Add:

if (itemId == 6950) { if (c.isDonator == 1) { } else { c.sendMessage("You must be a donator to use this item."); } if (c.playerMagicBook == 0) { if (c.playerLevel[6] >= 94) { if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastVeng > 30000) { c.vengOn = true; c.lastVeng = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.startAnimation(4410); c.gfx100(342); c .sendMessage("The Orb unleashes the wrath of Vengeance upon you!"); } else { c .sendMessage("You have to wait 30 seconds before you can use this Orb again."); } } else { c .sendMessage("Your magic level has to be over 94 to use this Orb"); } } else { c .sendMessage("You must be on the regular spellbook to use this Orb."); } }

Now to explain the code

if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastVeng > 30000) {

States how much time until next time you can use veng/veng orb

if (itemId == 6950) { if (c.isDonator == 1) {

Item that casts veng and to use the item requires donar.

c.startAnimation(4410); c.gfx100(342);

the animation and gfx idâ€™s the gfx isnt right it just looks alot cooler.

The rest is pretty self explainitory.

Dont leave stupid comments.
